column5: I see a lot of people mentioning Wabigoon Lake. I have'nt been there in years(Melander's camp,Gus Melander, and Polar Star Lodge) and was wondering how the fishing was? I have many fond memories of being there with my parents.

Have been there for the last two years at Hubers lodge. Great service and accomodations. The fishing has been slow for Walleye. Did portage to the smallie lake last year, and it was incredible 4-6lb smallies all over the place. Will be going there or Lake of the Woods this year at Totem lodge. Good Luck
